pullRequest.title: Manage Operational Layers - VBox styles
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Moving more CSS to the main class after verification. VBox width/height/padding styles were not carried across to the SV. I've made the changes and tested in the SV.
FYI @sclaridge for when we look at the SV more, this is a good example to explore and decide what we want to achieve to improve/avoid this in the future. Seems to be more of an issue when it isn't an fxml sample.
@JonLavi first review please, thanks!

Checklist:

 Set target branch to master (current release) or dev (next release)
 Request a reviewer
 Assign a reviewer
 Tag reviewer in comment
